src_original: (A-av 32)  tena yāvad rājyavaipākyaṃ kuśalamākṣiptaṃ /  tato bhagavatā smitaṃ vidarśitaṃ /
tgt_original: 爾時世尊受已，因即微笑。

src_original: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ vidarśayanti /  tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātamañjiṣṭhasphaṭikarajatavarṇā arciṣo mukhān niścaranti /  kecidūrdhvato gacchanti kecidadhastād gacchanti /
tgt_original: 諸佛常法，若有微笑，即放青黃赤白種種之光從口而出，其光或上或下。

src_original: ye 'dho gacchanti te sañjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīciparyanteṣu gatvā ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti /
tgt_original: 下者救地獄苦，等活、黑繩、眾合、大叫、小炎熱、極熱、阿鼻地獄等，及八寒地獄： 有疱地獄、阿吒訶、吒訶婆、呼婆呼、白蓮、青蓮、大蓮花等地獄。

src_original: ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti /  tena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kāraṇaviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabhyante /
tgt_original: 其熱地獄遇此光者皆得清涼，寒地獄者遇佛光明皆溫煖，此等眾生所有苦惱皆蒙捨息。

src_original: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 免其苦已，咸作是念：

src_original: kiṃ nu bhavanto vayamitaścyutā āhosvidanyatropapannā iti /
tgt_original: 「我等於此捨命，生餘處耶？

src_original: teṣāṃ bhagavān prasādasaṃjananārthaṃ nirmitaṃ visarjayati /  teṣāmevaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 」爾時世尊愍彼有情故，遣一化身往地獄中，彼等有情見佛化身，咸作是念：

src_original: na vayaṃ cyutā nāpyanyatropapannāḥ /
tgt_original: 「我等不從此滅，於餘處生。

src_original: api tu ayamapūrvadarśano 'syānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇaviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti /
tgt_original: 由佛威力故，令我等輩息諸苦惱。

src_original: te nirmite cittāni prasādayitvā narakavedanīyāni karmāṇi kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti /
tgt_original: 」皆發信心，苦業都盡。 從地獄滅，於人天界受生；

src_original: ye ūrdhvato gacchanti te caturmahārājikān devāṃstrayastriṃśān yāmāṃstuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn  paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmān parīttābhān apramāṇābhān  ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhān śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān
tgt_original: 爾時光至上方者，其光普遍四天王天、三十三天、覩史多天、化樂天、他化自在天、梵摩天、梵輔天、大梵天、少光天、無量光天、極光淨，乃至無色界四天。

src_original: abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhaparyanteṣu deveṣu gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ  śūnyam anātmeti udghoṣayanti /  gāthādvayaṃ ca bhāṣante /
tgt_original: 光所至諸處天，皆悉唱言無常苦空，說二伽他曰：

src_original: ārabhadhvaṃ niṣkrāmata yujyadhvaṃ buddhaśāsane /
tgt_original: 「汝當求出離，　　於佛教勤修；

src_original: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāramiva kuñjaraḥ //  (A-av 33)
tgt_original: 降伏生死軍，　　如象摧草舍。

src_original: yo hyasmin dharmavinaye apramattaścariṣyati /
tgt_original: 於此法律中，　　常為不放逸；

src_original: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati //
tgt_original: 能竭煩惱海，　　當盡苦邊際。

src_original: atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantamevānugacchanti /
tgt_original: 」其光普遍三千大千世界已，漸復收卷，隨世尊行。

src_original: yadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante 'nāgataṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati purato 'ntardhīyante /
tgt_original: 若佛世尊，欲記過去事，光從前沒； 欲記未來事，光從後沒；

src_original: narakopapattiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati pādatale 'ntardhīyante /  tiryagupapattiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati pārṣṇyāmantardhīyante /  pretopapattiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati pādāṃguṣṭhe 'ntardhīyante /
tgt_original: 若記地獄事，光從脚下沒； 若記傍生事，光從踵沒； 若記餓鬼事，光從趺沒；

src_original: manuṣyopapattiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati jānuno[ra]ntardhīyante /
tgt_original: 若記人間事，光從膝沒；

src_original: balacakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati vāme karatale 'ntardhīyante /  cakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati dakṣiṇe karatale 'ntardhīyante /  devopapattiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati nābhyāmantardhīyante /
tgt_original: 若記力輪王事，光從左掌沒； 若記轉輪王事，光從右掌沒； 若記生天事，光從臍沒；

src_original: śrāvakabodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati āsye 'ntardhīyante /  pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati ūrṇāyāmantardhīyante /  anuttarāṃ smayaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati uṣṇīṣe 'ntardhīyante /
tgt_original: 若記聲聞菩提事，光從口中沒； 若記緣覺菩提事，光從眉間沒； 若記無上正等覺事，光從頂沒。

src_original: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato vāme karatale 'ntarhitāḥ /
tgt_original: 于時佛光遶世尊三匝，從眉間沒。
